title: GCAS Noam Chomsky Lecture with Lewis Gordon and Azfar Hussain
description:
Prof. Noam Chomsky will be giving a lecture entitled "The Most Remarkable Moment in History" with Questions from our Youtube Stream.  Prof. Lewis R. Gordon will be Introducing and Moderating.
